name: Sony Corporation
description: Japan-based company engaged in businesses of consumer and professional electronics, gaming, entertainment and financial services

name: Sony Music Entertainment Inc.
description: US-based music publishing company

name: Sony Mobile Communications AB
description: UK-based company engaged in product research, development, design, production, distribution, marketing, sale and customer servicing of mobile phones, accessories and applications

name: Sony Pictures Entertainment Inc.
description: US-based media company involved in motion picture production and distribution, television programming and syndication, home video acquisition and distribution, operation of studio facilities, development of new entertainment technologies and distribution of filmed entertainment

name: Sony Network Communications Inc.
description: Japan based internet service provider

name: Sony Pictures Networks India Pvt. Ltd.
description: India-based media company

name: Sony/ATV Music Publishing LLC
description: US-based music publisher

name: Sony Financial Holdings Inc.
description: Japan based arm of Sony Group Financial controling life insurance companies, non-life insurance companies and banks

name: Sony Pictures Television International
description: US-based producer and distributor of films and television networks

name: Sony Ericsson Mobile Communications AB
description: US based automotive and industrial wireless solutions provider

name: IBM Corporation
description: US-based provider of IT products and services

name: IBM Global Services
description: IBM IT consultancy

name: Grupo Ibmec Educacional S.A.
description: Brazil-based educational institution that provides graduation programs including certification program in business administration

name: IBM (x86 server business)
description: US-based unit comprises IBM's System x line, which includes System x, BladeCenter and Flex System blade servers and switches, x86-based Flex integrated systems, NeXtScale and iDataPlex servers and associated software, blade networking and maintenance operations

name: IBM Credit LLC
description: US-based leasing company

name: HGST, Inc.
description: US-based manufacturer and developer of hard disk drives and components for PCs, servers, and electronic devices

name: IBM Corporation (Personal Computing Division)
description: US based personal computing division of IBM Corporation.

name: IBM Corporation (semiconductor manufacturing operations)
description: US-based chip manufacturing and semiconductor unit of IBM Corporation

name: The IBM Watson Group
description: US-based investment holding company having interest in operators of intelligence technology platform for creating interactive virtual agents to chat

name: IBM Japan Services Company Ltd.
description: Japan-based company engaged in the provision of computer hardware and software products, consulting, systems integration and other technology services
